title: Krishna Shroff clears air about ‘topless’ pictures; says she didn’t show nipple!
text:
Krishna Shroff clears air about ‘topless’ pictures; says she didn’t show nipple! By Rashmi Mishra on October 18, 2015 at 1:06 PM Comments What is the definition of topless? Well, unless the picture shows nipple(s), the photograph cannot be called topless. This is what the Internet’s new found most loved celebrity Krishna Shroff had to say about her recent bold pictures shared on Instagram. The 22-year-old daughter of evergreen Bollywood actor Jackie Shroff and younger sister of Tiger Shroff, rising actors of this generation is making an individual identity for oneself. Also See: 13 sexy pictures of Krishna Shroff will prove why you should follow her on Instagram! Krishna was in news for sharing ‘topless’ pictures few months back and once again returned to send the social media in tizzy with another ‘topless’ picture . These pictures have not provided Krishna with only positive remarks but also escalated into something as worse as nude pictures controversy. Well, the open-minded youngster has cleared about in her recent interview with DNA. Undoubtedly, Krishna comes across as a clear-headed person as she spoke about the attention she is getting because of her pictures. She said, “Being Jackie Shroff’s daughter and Tiger Shroff’s sister, I guess this was bound to happen. So I don’t blame people for what they are doing.” Her personal space is raided because she happens to be a star kid. The girl said, “Like I said last time, who would give a s**t if I was nobody? It’s definitely because my family is in the industry and people know them.” Also Read: Krishna Shroff is SEXY! Tiger Shroff’s sister is breaking internet with smoking hot pictures . Krishna said she is fine with everything the media had to say or comment about the photo shoot but she had one issue regarding the coverage. She said, “I just have one issue. With the word ‘topless’. I think that’s ridiculous because to be topless, you have to show nipple. I just think that it’s a little backward when it comes to things like this. No offence to anyone but people today cant really be free or express themselves however they want to because of the amount of judgement that happens these days. I just feel the society is a little backwards.” Adding further over the buzzing modelling and acting prospects which have mushroomed after the pictures being appreciated by many, Krishna said she is unaware of the modelling world. As for acting, she sees her star brother act and work hard. She adds that ‘acting is more than just about having a pretty face.’
